comment:
Extracted Variables:
- x: number of full-time staff hired
- y: number of part-time staff hired

Definitions:
- x: number of full-time staff hired by the municipality
- y: number of part-time staff hired by the municipality

Constraints:
- Total hours constraint: 40x + 15y \geq 1000
- Budget constraint: 1280x + 450y \leq 31500
- Non-negativity constraint: x, y \geq 0

Objective:
- Minimize the total number of staff hired: Minimize x + y
